statements: SELECT * FROM customer_engagement_metrics WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, click_through_rate FROM customer_engagement_metrics WHERE click_through_rate >= 0.5;
SELECT * FROM customer_engagement_metrics WHERE conversion_rate < 0.1;
SELECT customer_id, conversion_rate FROM customer_engagement_metrics WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT AVG(click_through_rate) AS average_ctr FROM customer_engagement_metrics;
SELECT customer_id, click_through_rate, conversion_rate FROM customer_engagement_metrics WHERE click_through_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC
SELECT customer_id, click_through_rate, conversion_rate FROM customer_engagement_metrics WHERE click_through_rate < 0.3 ORDER BY click_through_rate ASC
SELECT customer_id, click_through_rate, conversion_rate FROM customer_engagement_metrics WHERE conversion_rate >= 0.2 ORDER BY customer_id
SELECT customer_id, click_through_rate, conversion_rate FROM customer_engagement_metrics WHERE click_through_rate BETWEEN 0.3 AND 0.6 ORDER BY customer_id DESC, click_through_rate
SELECT customer_id, AVG(click_through_rate) AS avg_ctr, AVG(conversion_rate) AS avg_conv_rate FROM customer_engagement_metrics GROUP BY customer_id HAVING avg_ctr > 0.4 ORDER BY avg_ctr DESC
SELECT customer_id, click_through_rate, conversion_rate FROM CustomerEngagementMetrics;
SELECT * FROM ClickData WHERE customer_id = 12345;
SELECT click_timestamp, click_action FROM ClickData ORDER BY click_timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_id, click_through_rate, conversion_rate FROM CustomerEngagementMetrics WHERE click_through_rate > 0.5;
SELECT customer_id, click_through_rate, conversion_rate FROM CustomerEngagementMetrics WHERE conversion_rate < 0.2;
SELECT customer_id, click_through_rate, conversion_rate FROM CustomerEngagementMetrics WHERE conversion_rate >= 0.5 ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC;
SELECT click_id, click_timestamp, click_action FROM ClickData WHERE click_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY click_timestamp ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM CustomerEngagementMetrics
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(click_id) AS total_clicks FROM CustomerEngagementMetrics JOIN ClickData ON CustomerEngagementMetrics.customer_id = ClickData.customer_id GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT AVG(click_through_rate) AS avg_ctr, MAX(conversion_rate) AS max_conversion_rate FROM CustomerEngagementMetrics;
SELECT * FROM customer_engagement_metrics;
SELECT customer_id, click_through_rate FROM customer_engagement_metrics ORDER BY click_through_rate DESC;
SELECT customer_id, conversion_rate FROM customer_engagement_metrics WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5;
SELECT log_id, page_url, timestamp FROM click_logs WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT event_id, event_type, time_trigger FROM conversion_events ORDER BY time_trigger;
SELECT customer_id, click_through_rate, conversion_rate FROM customer_engagement_metrics WHERE click_through_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY click_through_rate DESC
SELECT log_id, page_url, timestamp FROM click_logs WHERE DATE(timestamp) = '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT customer_id, page_url, timestamp FROM customer_engagement_metrics JOIN click_logs ON customer_engagement_metrics.customer_id = click_logs.customer_id
SELECT customer_id, event_type, time_trigger FROM conversion_events WHERE event_type = 'purchase' AND time_trigger BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59' ORDER BY time_trigger DESC

SELECT customer_id, SUM(click_through_rate) AS total_click_through_rate FROM customer_engagement_metrics GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_click_through_rate > 1.0 ORDER BY total_click_through_rate DESC
SELECT customer_id, click_through_rate FROM customer_engagement_metrics ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM click_logs WHERE customer_id = 1234;
SELECT name, email FROM customer_details WHERE customer_id = 5678;
SELECT customer_id, conversion_rate FROM customer_engagement_metrics WHERE click_through_rate > 0.5;
SELECT log_id, customer_id, conversion_timestamp FROM conversion_logs ORDER BY conversion_timestamp ASC;
SELECT customer_id, click_through_rate, conversion_rate FROM customer_engagement_metrics WHERE customer_id = 123456;
SELECT name, email FROM customer_details WHERE customer_id = 789012;
SELECT name, click_through_rate FROM customer_details JOIN customer_engagement_metrics ON customer_details.customer_id = customer_engagement_metrics.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(log_id) AS total_clicks FROM click_logs GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_clicks > 5;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(click_through_rate) AS avg_ctr FROM customer_engagement_metrics GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY avg_ctr DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_engagement_metrics;
SELECT customer_id, click_through_rate, conversion_rate FROM customer_engagement_metrics ORDER BY click_through_rate DESC;
SELECT customer_id, click_through_rate, conversion_rate FROM customer_engagement_metrics WHERE click_through_rate > 0.5;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customer_details WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT segment_id, segment_name FROM customer_segments ORDER BY segment_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, click_through_rate, conversion_rate FROM customer_engagement_metrics ORDER BY customer_id DESC, conversion_rate ASC
SELECT * FROM click_through_logs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND click_action = 'Clicked'
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customer_details WHERE LENGTH(email) > 10 ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT * FROM conversion_logs WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM customer_segments WHERE segment_name = 'VIP')
SELECT c.customer_id, c.name, c.email, ce.click_through_rate, ce.conversion_rate FROM customer_details c JOIN customer_engagement_metrics ce ON c.customer_id = ce.customer_id
